name: Ropacy
description:
This is a story about a ghost who want to go at the beach because she find his mountain annoying.

So she possess a rock to roll at this beautiful beach.

Enjoy this plateforme game named Ropacy !

Made by Julia, Arthur , and me !

Music by Camille (LV 1 , 2 ,3) and me (LV4)

(maplestory 2 OST Yester Story in the credit)
